name: Mini Bash
description:
The Goal is to kick out the other player by using your ability (Space/Ctrl, 3 seconds cooldown).

Your ability creates a force around you that kicks away the other player if too close, and is stronger the closer the other player is.

The speed buff lasts until you use your abilty and respawns after 5 seconds.

I would`ve liked to make the game look nicer and function better (becuase it has some bugs) but I didn`t have the time to do that and I just wanted to finish something, because I always start games and forget about them after a week.
